colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @030B (CES PA 'DI NI BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED MCHOG SPRUL GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN GYI 'DZIN CHOS SU, ^BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON MES RANG LO NYER GSUM PA LA DPAL LDAN 'BRAS SPUNGS SU BRIS PA'O,, ,,) *, ,AOm SVASTI, BKA' BSTAN GZHUNG LUGS MA LUS TSAD MA YI, ,SRANG DU GZHAL BYED MKHYEN RAB BYE BA'I MDZOD, ,GUNG THANG 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS ZHES DON MTHUN GYI, ,GRAGS PA'I BA DAN RNAM PAR GA-YO DES RGYAL, ,MGON DE'I LEGS BSHAD LUNG RIGS BANG MDZOD 'DI, ,TSIG TSOGS CHUNG YANG ZAB DON 'DOD DGU'I GTER, ,GONG 'OG BSRES PA'I RTZA LA BSHAD RI MO DANG, ,ZER SGROS TSIG GI GTER DANG GA LA MTSUNGS, ,DPYAD GSUM DAG PA'I RLUNG GI 'KHOR LO LO YIS, ,SNGON RABS MTHA' DPYOD BYED MA'I SA 'DZIN 'GAL, ,BLA 'OG 'GYUR BA @031A *, ,'BAD PAS SGRUB MIN GYI, ,RANG GI SDOD MI TSUGS KYI RANG BZHIN YIN, ,DKA' BA'I GNAS LA DPYOD NUS BLO GSAL DANG, ,TSIG TSOGS CHE LA ZHUM PA'I SKYID LUG CAN, ,GNYIS KAR PHAN BYED GSANG BSHAD ZLA MED 'DI, ,MTHA' DPYOD LAG LDAN TSOGS LA SENG PHRUG BZHIN, ,DE PHYIR SKYABS MGON RJE BTZUN DAM PA YI, ,GDAN SA CHEN PO'I GZHUNG GSAR DGE 'DUN RNAMS, ,PHYIS 'BYUNG BLA GSAR YONGS LA RNAM DPYOD KYI, ,MIG GI MCHOD SBYIN 'GYED PHYIR PAR DU SGRUBS, ,'DIR 'BAD DGE BA'I KLUNG PHRAN JI SNYED PA, ,RGYAL SRAS SPYOD PA'I RGYA MTSO DANG 'DRES NAS, ,RTEN BYUNG TSUL GSUNGS RGYAL BSTAN NOR BU'AI MDZOD, ,'DZAD MED 'BYUNG BA'I GZHI DANG RTEN DU SHOG ,RGYU SBYOR DO DAM BRIS BRKO'I LAS BYED GTZOS, ,TSE RABS KUN TU BSTAN PA'I KHUR THEG PA'I, ,RNAM DAG RTEN BZANG BRGYUD MAR THOB PA YIS, ,RGYAL BA DGYES PA'I LAM LA 'JUG PAR SHOG ,(CES PAR BYANG DGOS TSUL DO DAM PA DKA' BCU BLO BZANG RAB BRTAN DANG GZHUNG GSAR GONG MA'I 'DZIN GRVA NI SKYOR DPON DGE TSUL NGAG DBANG SOGS GRVA RIGS RNAMS KYI CHA 'DOD MA LTAR BLA MING MKHAS GRUB KYIS BGYIS PA MANGGA LAm, ,)
